channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This Billionaire's Startup Wanted To Build A Space Station. Now It Can Barely Pay Its Bills
item.description: Billionaire Kam Ghaffarian's startup wants to build a space station to replace the ISS. But missteps, dire financials and delays have sent it spiralin...

item.title: Vocal fatigue
item.description: Most of us talk, some of us do it for a living. When your voice is on the fritz, it can affect your entire body as well as the way you approach your d...

item.title: How To Drive Operational Success Through Effective Annual Planning
item.description: Operational success is the backbone of any thriving organization, and effective annual planning can help achieve it.

item.title: Bye now
item.description: The difference between ‘buy now’ and ‘bye now’ is very thin. Sometimes, when we push very hard for a commitment, we break the trust we’ve earned. For ...

item.title: The Innovation Olympics: Lessons For Success
item.description: Innovation leaders can draw valuable lessons from Olympic athletes about mental fortitude under pressure, and what it takes to succeed.

item.title: Modern apologies
item.description: The AI driven voice mail system said, “I’m sorry, I didn’t understand you.” Of course, there is no “I” and by most definitions of sorry, it’s not. But...

item.title: Lunar Eclipse Tonight: When To See, Livestream And Photograph It
item.description: Exactly when to see September's full moon, the "Harvest Supermoon Eclipse,", drift into Earth's shadow to cause a partial lunar eclipse on September 1...

item.title: The hierarchy of insight
item.description: It looks like this: Which do we measure the most, spend the most obtaining and argue about most often? We might have it backwards. HT Russ Ackoff.

item.title: Making The Leap: What The Consumer Era Means For The Energy Transition
item.description: Technology helps humans make leaps forward; we need it to help us accelerate the energy transition.

item.title: Banana Equivalents
